headline.main: GREEKS SCORN TALK OF PEACE PARLEYS; Foreign Office Calls Reports 'Absurd'--Says Britain Is Giving 'All Possible Aid'

lead_paragraph: ATHENS, Greece, Oct. 31 (UP)-- The Foreign Office tonight branded as "absurd" reports abroad that Greece might enter into peace talks with Italy and said that, not only were all Greek defenses holding along the frontier, but "Britain already is giving all possible aid."
